summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4286 for the improvement of Grand Street, from 12th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50924, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
